languages.text: "Мне то неведомо. Мой тебе совет — не пытайся проникнуть в мысли ксеноса. Они слишком противоестественны, чтобы нормальный разум мог их постичь. Рискуешь сам{mf||а} подхватить от них заразу ущербности".

"I know nothing of his reasons. Here is my advice to you: do not try to peer into a xenos's thoughts. They are too perverse for a sound mind to comprehend. You would only risk catching that blight of degeneracy yourself."
languages.original_text: "Мне то неведомо. Мой тебе совет — не пытайся проникнуть в мысли ксеноса. Они слишком противоестественны, чтобы нормальный разум мог их постичь. Рискуешь сам{mf||а} подхватить от них заразу ущербности".

traits.locale_text: "I know nothing of his reasons. Here is my advice to you: don't try to gaze into a xenos's thoughts. They are too perverse for a sound mind to comprehend. You would only risk catching that blight of degeneracy yourself."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I know nothing of his reasons. Here is my advice to you: do not try to peer into a xenos's thoughts. They are too perverse for a sound mind to comprehend. You would only risk catching that blight of degeneracy yourself."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Je n'en ai pas la moindre idée. Mais j'ai un conseil pour vous : n'essayez pas de comprendre les motivations d'un xénos. Ces êtres sont trop pervers pour être compris par une personne sensée. Vous risqueriez d'être à votre tour {mf|contaminé|contaminée} par leur dégénérescence. »
languages.original_text: "I know nothing of his reasons. Here is my advice to you: do not try to peer into a xenos's thoughts. They are too perverse for a sound mind to comprehend. You would only risk catching that blight of degeneracy yourself."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'en ai pas la moindre idée. Mais j'ai un conseil pour vous : n'essayez pas de comprendre les motivations d'un xénos. Ces êtres sont trop pervers pour être compris par une personne sensée. Vous risqueriez d'être à votre tour {mf|contaminé|contaminée} par leur dégénérescence. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “他怎么想的，我一点都不了解。我可以给你个建议：别打算弄清楚异形的想法。那些家伙的思想过于堕落，头脑健全的人根本无法理解。若是妄图弄清他们的想法，最终只会让你走上异端邪道。”
languages.original_text: "I know nothing of his reasons. Here is my advice to you: do not try to peer into a xenos's thoughts. They are too perverse for a sound mind to comprehend. You would only risk catching that blight of degeneracy yourself."

traits.locale_text: “他怎么想的，我一点都不了解。我可以给你个建议：别打算弄清楚异形的想法。那些家伙的思想过于堕落，头脑健全的人根本无法理解。若是妄图弄清他们的想法，最终只会让你走上异端邪道。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「奴の理屈など何も知らん。ひとつ助言しておくが、異種族の思考など覗き見しようとしないことだ。連中の倒錯ぶりは、まともな精神じゃとても理解できん。お前自身があの堕落の病に汚染されてしまうだけだ」
languages.original_text: "I know nothing of his reasons. Here is my advice to you: do not try to peer into a xenos's thoughts. They are too perverse for a sound mind to comprehend. You would only risk catching that blight of degeneracy yourself."

traits.locale_text: 「奴の理屈など何も知らん。ひとつ助言しておくが、異種族の思考など覗き見しようとしないことだ。連中の倒錯ぶりは、まともな精神じゃとても理解できん。お前自身があの堕落の病に汚染されてしまうだけだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ich kenne keine Gründe. Aber hier ist mein Rat an Euch – versucht nicht in die Gedankenwelt eines Xenos vorzudringen. Sie ist einfach zu pervers, als dass sie ein gesunder Verstand begreifen könnte. Ihr riskiert dabei bloß, Euch selbst mit der Seuche der Verkommenheit anzustecken."
languages.original_text: "I know nothing of his reasons. Here is my advice to you: do not try to peer into a xenos's thoughts. They are too perverse for a sound mind to comprehend. You would only risk catching that blight of degeneracy yourself."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kenne keine Gründe. Aber hier ist mein Rat an Euch – versucht nicht in die Gedankenwelt eines Xenos vorzudringen. Sie ist einfach zu pervers, als dass sie ein gesunder Verstand begreifen könnte. Ihr riskiert dabei bloß, Euch selbst mit der Seuche der Verkommenheit anzustecken."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Ignoro sus motivos. Pero te daré un consejo: no intentes comprender la mente de un xenos. Son demasiado perversos para las mentes cuerdas. Lo único que se consigue con eso es arriesgarte a contraer la plaga de su degeneración».
languages.original_text: "I know nothing of his reasons. Here is my advice to you: do not try to peer into a xenos's thoughts. They are too perverse for a sound mind to comprehend. You would only risk catching that blight of degeneracy yourself."

traits.locale_text: «Ignoro sus motivos. Pero te daré un consejo: no intentes comprender la mente de un xenos. Son demasiado perversos para las mentes cuerdas. Lo único que se consigue con eso es arriesgarte a contraer la plaga de su degeneración».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Neyi neden yaptığını bilmiyorum. Sana şöyle bir tavsiyede bulunayım: Zenoların ne düşündüğünü anlamaya çalışma. Aklıselim insanların idrak edemeyeceği kadar sapkınlardır. Sen de o soysuzluk illetine tutulma tehlikesine girersin."
languages.original_text: "I know nothing of his reasons. Here is my advice to you: do not try to peer into a xenos's thoughts. They are too perverse for a sound mind to comprehend. You would only risk catching that blight of degeneracy yourself."

traits.locale_text: "Neyi neden yaptığını bilmiyorum. Sana şöyle bir tavsiyem olacak: Zenoların ne düşündüğünü anlamaya çalışma. Aklıselim insanların idrak edemeyeceği kadar sapkın olurlar. Sen de o soysuzluk illetine tutulma tehlikesine girersin."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
